verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and to Aaron לֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

דַּבְּר֛וּ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> These הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תֹּאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> which ye shall eat מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> among all the beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> that [are] on the earth

כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> Whatever מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <S%H6536><s%> Whatsoever parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <S%H6541><s%> the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <S%H8156><s%> making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <S%H8157><s%> cleft פְּרָסֹ֔ת <S%H6541><s%> hoofs מַעֲלַ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <S%H1625><s%> the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> that shall ye eat

אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> of these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> these shall ye not eat מִֽמַּעֲלֵי֙ <S%H5927><s%> of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <S%H1625><s%> the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֖י <S%H6536><s%> or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֑ה <S%H6541><s%> the hoof אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠גָּמָל <S%H1581><s%> [as] the camel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַעֲלֵ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> because he cheweth גֵרָ֜ה <S%H1625><s%> the cud ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּפַרְסָה֙ <S%H6541><s%> not the hoof אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> does not מַפְרִ֔יס <S%H6536><s%> but divideth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁפָ֗ן <S%H8227><s%> And the coney כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַעֲלֵ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> because he cheweth גֵרָה֙ <S%H1625><s%> the cud ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <S%H6541><s%> not the hoof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַפְרִ֑יס <S%H6536><s%> but divideth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַרְנֶ֗בֶת <S%H768><s%> And the hare כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַעֲלַ֤ת <S%H5927><s%> because he cheweth גֵּרָה֙ <S%H1625><s%> the cud הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <S%H6541><s%> not the hoof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not הִפְרִ֑יסָה <S%H6536><s%> but divideth טְמֵאָ֥ה <S%H2931><s%> he [is] unclean הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠חֲזִיר <S%H2386><s%> And the swine כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַפְרִ֨יס <S%H6536><s%> though he divide פַּרְסָ֜ה <S%H6541><s%> the hoof ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> thus וְשֹׁסַ֥ע <S%H8156><s%> making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <S%H8157><s%> cleft פַּרְסָ֔ה <S%H6541><s%> hoof וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גֵּרָ֣ה <S%H1625><s%> not the cud לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִגָּ֑ר <S%H1641><s%> yet he cheweth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃

מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> Of their flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> shall ye not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> and their carcase לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִגָּ֑עוּ <S%H5060><s%> shall ye not touch טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶֽם׃

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> These shall ye eat מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לוֹ֩ סְנַפִּ֨יר <S%H5579><s%> whatsoever hath fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֜שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> and scales בַּמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> in the waters בַּיַּמִּ֛ים <S%H3220><s%> in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֖ים <S%H5158><s%> and in the rivers אֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> them shall ye eat

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> that אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have ל֜וֹ סְנַפִּ֣יר <S%H5579><s%> And all that have not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֗שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> and scales בַּיַּמִּים֙ <S%H3220><s%> in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֔ים <S%H5158><s%> and in the rivers מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> of all that move הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> in the waters וּמִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> thing הַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> and of any living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> which [is] in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> they [shall be] an abomination הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶֽם׃

וְשֶׁ֖קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> They shall be even an abomination יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֑ם מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> of their flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> may not תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> unto you ye shall not eat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> but ye shall have their carcases תְּשַׁקֵּֽצוּ׃ <S%H8262><s%> in abomination

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> does not אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have ל֛וֹ סְנַפִּ֥יר <S%H5579><s%> Whatsoever hath no fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> nor scales בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> that [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These תְּשַׁקְּצ֣וּ <S%H8262><s%> And these [are they which] ye shall have in abomination מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> among הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> the fowls לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> they shall not be eaten שֶׁ֣קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> they [are] an abomination הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H5404><s%> the eagle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֔רֶס <S%H6538><s%> and the ossifrage וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הָעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5822><s%> and the ospray
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֨דָּאָ֔ה <S%H1676><s%> And the vulture וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַיָּ֖ה <S%H344><s%> and the kite לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind
אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֹרֵ֖ב <S%H6158><s%> Every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3284><s%> and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <S%H8464><s%> and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁ֑חַף <S%H7828><s%> and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּ֖ץ <S%H5322><s%> and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכּ֥וֹס <S%H3563><s%> And the little owl וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁלָ֖ךְ <S%H7994><s%> and the cormorant וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּנְשֽׁוּף׃ <S%H3244><s%> and the great owl
וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתִּנְשֶׁ֥מֶת <S%H8580><s%> And the swan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקָּאָ֖ת <S%H6893><s%> and the pelican וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָחָֽם׃ <S%H7360><s%> and the gier eagle

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲסִידָ֔ה <S%H2624><s%> And the stork הָאֲנָפָ֖ה <S%H601><s%> the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <S%H4327><s%> after her kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <S%H1744><s%> and the lapwing וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <S%H5847><s%> and the bat

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> that creep הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> All fowls הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> going עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H702><s%> upon [all] four שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃ ס

אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> Yet אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> these תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> Yet these may ye eat מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> creeping הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of every flying הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> thing that goeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H702><s%> upon [all] four אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which [לֹא כ] (לֹ֤ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) כְרָעַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3767><s%> which have legs מִמַּ֣עַל <S%H4605><s%> above לְרַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> their feet לְנַתֵּ֥ר <S%H5425><s%> to leap בָּהֵ֖ן <S%H2004><s%> withal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> you תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> [Even] these of them ye may eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H697><s%> the locust לְמִינ֔וֹ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסָּלְעָ֖ם <S%H5556><s%> and the bald locust לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחַרְגֹּ֣ל <S%H2728><s%> and the beetle לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶחָגָ֖ב <S%H2284><s%> and the grasshopper לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> creeping things הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> But all [other] flying אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ל֖וֹ אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> which have four רַגְלָ֑יִם <S%H7272><s%> feet שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃

וּלְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <S%H2930><s%> And for these ye shall be unclean כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> whosoever toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> the carcase יִטְמָ֥א <S%H2930><s%> of them shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and whoever הַנֹּשֵׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> And whosoever beareth מִנִּבְלָתָ֑ם <S%H5038><s%> [ought] of the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <S%H3526><s%> of them shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבְּהֵמָ֡ה <S%H929><s%> [The carcases] of every beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִוא֩ <S%H1931><s%> he מַפְרֶ֨סֶת <S%H6536><s%> which divideth פַּרְסָ֜ה <S%H6541><s%> the hoof וְשֶׁ֣סַע ׀ <S%H8156><s%> make אֵינֶ֣נָּה <S%H369><s%> else שֹׁסַ֗עַת <S%H8157><s%> cleft וְגֵרָה֙ <S%H1625><s%> the cud אֵינֶ֣נָּה <S%H369><s%> not מַעֲלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> nor cheweth טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> unto you every one that toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> them shall be unclean

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> whatever הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> goeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כַּפָּ֗יו <S%H3709><s%> upon his paws בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> among all manner of beasts הַהֹלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> that go עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֔ע <S%H702><s%> on [all] four טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> those [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> unto you whoso toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> their carcase יִטְמָ֥א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְהַנֹּשֵׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> And he that beareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָתָ֔ם <S%H5038><s%> the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <S%H3526><s%> of them shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְטָמֵ֣א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the even טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> they [are] unclean הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶֽם׃ ס

וְזֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> now these לָכֶם֙ הַטָּמֵ֔א <S%H2931><s%> These also [shall be] unclean בַּשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> unto you among the creeping things הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> that creep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth הַחֹ֥לֶד <S%H2467><s%> the weasel וְהָעַכְבָּ֖ר <S%H5909><s%> and the mouse וְהַצָּ֥ב <S%H6632><s%> and the tortoise לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind

וְהָאֲנָקָ֥ה <S%H604><s%> And the ferret וְהַכֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> and the chameleon וְהַלְּטָאָ֑ה <S%H3911><s%> and the lizard וְהַחֹ֖מֶט <S%H2546><s%> and the snail וְהַתִּנְשָֽׁמֶת׃ <S%H8580><s%> and the mole

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַטְּמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> These [are] unclean לָכֶ֖ם בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַשָּׁ֑רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> to you among all that creep כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֧עַ <S%H5060><s%> whosoever doth touch בָּהֶ֛ם בְּמֹתָ֖ם <S%H4194><s%> them when they be dead יִטְמָ֥א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִפֹּל־ <S%H5307><s%> doth fall עָלָיו֩ <S%H5921><s%> and מֵהֶ֨ם ׀ <S%H1992><s%> they בְּמֹתָ֜ם <S%H4194><s%> And upon whatsoever [any] of them when they are dead יִטְמָ֗א <S%H2930><s%> it shall be unclean מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> whether [it be] any vessel עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> of wood א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בֶ֤גֶד <S%H899><s%> or raiment אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or עוֹר֙ <S%H5785><s%> or skin א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שָׂ֔ק <S%H8242><s%> or sack כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִ֕י <S%H3627><s%> whatsoever vessel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> is done מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> [it be] wherein [any] work בָּהֶ֑ם בַּמַּ֧יִם <S%H4325><s%> into water יוּבָ֛א <S%H935><s%> it must be put וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and it shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the even וְטָהֵֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> so it shall be cleansed

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> vessel חֶ֔רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> And every earthen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> may fall מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּוֹכ֑וֹ <S%H8432><s%> hope כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> any אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּתוֹכ֛וֹ <S%H8432><s%> hope יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> whatsoever [is] in it shall be unclean וְאֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> תִשְׁבֹּֽרוּ׃ <S%H7665><s%> and ye shall break

מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and any הָאֹ֜כֶל <S%H400><s%> Of all meat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵאָכֵ֗ל <S%H398><s%> which may be eaten אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [that] on which [such] water יִטְמָ֑א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מַשְׁקֶה֙ <S%H4945><s%> and all drink אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשָּׁתֶ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> that may be drunk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every כְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> in every [such] vessel יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean

וְ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> Everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> falleth מִנִּבְלָתָ֥ם ׀ <S%H5038><s%> And every [thing] whereupon [any part] of their carcase עָלָיו֮ <S%H5921><s%> and יִטְמָא֒ <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean תַּנּ֧וּר <S%H8574><s%> [whether it be] oven וְכִירַ֛יִם <S%H3600><s%> or ranges יֻתָּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> for pots they shall be broken down טְמֵאִ֣ים <S%H2931><s%> [for] they [are] unclean הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> as וּטְמֵאִ֖ים <S%H2931><s%> and shall be unclean יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> and shall continue לָכֶֽם׃

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless מַעְיָ֥ן <S%H4599><s%> Nevertheless a fountain וּב֛וֹר <S%H953><s%> or pit מִקְוֵה־ <S%H4723><s%> [wherein there is] plenty מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become טָה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> shall be clean וְנֹגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> but that which toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> their carcase יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean

וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> If יִפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> fall מִנִּבְלָתָ֔ם <S%H5038><s%> And if [any part] of their carcase עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed זֵר֖וּעַ <S%H2221><s%> upon any sowing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִזָּרֵ֑עַ <S%H2232><s%> which is to be sown טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> it [shall be] clean הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if יֻתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> be put מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> But if [any] water עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on זֶ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> upon the seed וְנָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> fall מִנִּבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> and [any part] of their carcase עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> on טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> thereon it [shall be] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃ ס

וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> die מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> And if any beast אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> of which ye may eat הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> he that toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖הּ <S%H5038><s%> the carcase יִטְמָ֥א <S%H2930><s%> thereof shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְהָֽאֹכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> And he that eateth מִנִּבְלָתָ֔הּ <S%H5038><s%> of the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <S%H3526><s%> of it shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְטָמֵ֣א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the even וְהַנֹּשֵׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> he also that beareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלָתָ֔הּ <S%H5038><s%> the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <S%H3526><s%> of it shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> now every הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> And every creeping thing הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> that creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> it shall not be eaten

כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> Whatever הוֹלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Whatsoever goeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on גָּח֜וֹן <S%H1512><s%> upon the belly וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> and whatever הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and whatsoever goeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֗ע <S%H702><s%> upon [all] four עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever מַרְבֵּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> or whatsoever hath more רַגְלַ֔יִם <S%H7272><s%> feet לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> among all creeping things הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> that creep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכְל֖וּם <S%H398><s%> them ye shall not eat כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> for they [are] an abomination הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> do

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּשַׁקְּצוּ֙ <S%H8262><s%> abominable אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> yourselves בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> with any creeping thing הַשֹּׁרֵ֑ץ <S%H8317><s%> that creepeth וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִֽטַּמְּאוּ֙ <S%H2930><s%> with them that ye should be defiled בָּהֶ֔ם וְנִטְמֵתֶ֖ם <S%H2933><s%> neither shall ye make yourselves unclean בָּֽם׃

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> For I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <S%H430><s%> your God וְהִתְקַדִּשְׁתֶּם֙ <S%H6942><s%> ye shall therefore sanctify yourselves וִהְיִיתֶ֣ם <S%H1961><s%> become קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H6918><s%> and ye shall be holy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> for I [am] holy אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְטַמְּאוּ֙ <S%H2930><s%> neither shall ye defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> yourselves בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> with any manner of creeping thing הָרֹמֵ֥שׂ <S%H7430><s%> that creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> For I [am] the LORD הַֽמַּעֲלֶ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> that bringeth אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you up out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לִהְיֹ֥ת <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> to be your God וִהְיִיתֶ֣ם <S%H1961><s%> become קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H6918><s%> ye shall therefore be holy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> for I [am] holy אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֤ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> of the beasts וְהָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and of the fowl וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> creature הַֽחַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> and of every living הָרֹמֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7430><s%> that moveth בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in the waters וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everything נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and of every creature הַשֹּׁרֶ֥צֶת <S%H8317><s%> that creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <S%H914><s%> To make a difference בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַטָּמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> between the unclean וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> and between הַטָּהֹ֑ר <S%H2889><s%> and the clean וּבֵ֤ין <S%H996><s%> between הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> and between the beast הַֽנֶּאֱכֶ֔לֶת <S%H398><s%> that may be eaten וּבֵין֙ <S%H996><s%> between הַֽחַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> and the beast אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not תֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> that may not be eaten פ
